raw_body: JAYAWARDHANA – Major General Deshamanya ASOKA KANTHILAL,​ (Former Governor of the Northern & Eastern Provinces,​ former Secretary – Ministry of Defence and former Deputy Chief of Staff – Sri Lanka Army). Dearly beloved husband of late Srima and darling father of Amila and Imali,​ son of late Christie and late Swarna Jayawardhana,​ son-in-law of late Arthur and late Pearl Wijayasingha,​ beloved brother of late Dr. Nihal and of Dr. Ranjan (UK) and Colonel Sarath. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ Borella. Funeral with full military honours will be held at 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 20th December for cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4:30 p.m. (New Crematorium).083615
